data.eml:eml: One new species of the genus Belisana Thorell, 1898 (Araneae, Pholcidae) from northern Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pham, Dinh-Sac (2015): One new species of the genus Belisana Thorell, 1898 (Araneae, Pholcidae) from northern Vietnam. ZooKeys 480: 41-47, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.480.9046, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.480.9046
